long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show a warning in GitHub when "Squash and merge" is selected in a PR that looks like a deploy PR.

Currently only detects PRs merging a branch called "develop" into a branch called "main".
